mapper.select: SELECT t1.usercode as userId,t2.role_name as currentAuthority FROM t_user_list t1,t_sys_role t2,t_user_role t3 WHERE t1.id=t3.user_id AND t2.role_id=t3.role_id AND t1.flag='1' AND t1.usercode=#{account} AND t1.pwd=#{password}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_user_list t1,t_api_menu t2,t_sys_role t3,t_api_menu_role t4,t_user_role t5 WHERE t1.id=t5.user_id AND t2.menu_id=t4.menu_id AND t3.role_id=t5.role_id AND t3.role_id=t4.role_id AND t1.flag='1' AND t1.usercode=#{account} AND t2.menu_url=#{url}

SELECT l.username AS `name`,l.avatar AS avatar,l.usercode AS userid,s.notifyCount AS notifyCount FROM t_user_list l, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS notifyCount FROM t_user_list t1,t_user_message t2 WHERE t1.id=t2.userid AND t1.usercode=#{account} AND t2.`status`='0') s WHERE l.usercode=#{account} AND l.flag='1'
SELECT t1.id,t1.menuName AS `name`,t1.icon,t1.menuUrl AS path, authority as authoritys FROM t_sys_menu t1 WHERE t1.menuPid=0 and t1.flag='1' ORDER BY t1.sort asc
SELECT t1.menuName AS `name` ,t1.menuUrl AS path, authority as authoritys FROM t_sys_menu t1 WHERE t1.menuPid=1 and t1.parent=#{id} and t1.flag='1' ORDER BY t1.sort asc

SELECT t2.id,t2.sendimg AS avatar,t2.title,t2.sendTime AS datetime,t2.messagetype AS `type` FROM t_user_list t1,t_user_message t2 WHERE t1.id=t2.userid AND t1.usercode=#{account} AND t2.`status`='0' ORDER BY t2.sendTime DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS notifyCount FROM t_user_list t1,t_user_message t2 WHERE t1.id=t2.userid AND t1.usercode=#{account} AND t2.`status`='0'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user_message m, (SELECT t2.id FROM t_user_list t1,t_user_message t2 WHERE t1.id=t2.userid AND t1.usercode=#{account} AND t2.`status`='0' AND t2.messagetype=#{type} ORDER BY t2.sendTime DESC) t SET m.status='1' WHERE m.id=t.id
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_user_list t1 WHERE t1.usercode=#{account}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user_list t SET t.website=#{website},t.company=#{companyName},t.contact=#{linkman},t.tel=#{linkmanphone},t.username=#{companyName}, t.email=#{email},t.img1=#{img1},t.img2=#{img2},t.img3=#{img3},t.three=#{img4},t.verifycode=#{verifycode} WHERE t.usercode=#{userName}
mapper.select: SELECT t.usertype,t.company,t.contact,t.email,t.tel,t.website, t.img1,t.img2,t.img3,t.three,t.verifycode FROM t_user_list t WHERE t.usercode=#{account}
SELECT t1.id,t1.usertype FROM t_user_list t1 WHERE t1.usercode=#{account}

SELECT t.* FROM t_user_list t WHERE t.verifycode='3' AND t.flag='1'
and usertype=#{usertype}
and usercode like "%"#{usercode}"%"
ORDER BY t.createtime desc

SELECT t.* FROM t_user_list t WHERE usertype <> '0'
and company like "%"#{company}"%"
and usercode like "%"#{usercode}"%"
and verifycode=#{verifycode}
ORDER BY t.createtime desc
SELECT t.* FROM t_user_list t WHERE t.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user_list t SET t.lasttime=NOW() WHERE t.usercode=#{account}
mapper.select: SELECT usercode FROM t_user_list WHERE defaultAgent ='1'
